snippet: Brady Heslip scored 18 points and had five 3-pointers as No. 23 Baylor held on for a 66-64 victory over visiting South Carolina, without making a field goal in the final seven minutes.
lead_paragraph: Brady Heslip scored 18 points and had five 3-pointers as No. 23 Baylor held on for a 66-64 victory over visiting South Carolina, without making a field goal in the final seven minutes.

headline.main: Baylor Hangs On Against South Carolina
